## Teaching
Dr Yang primarily teaches epidemiology, statistics, and open science at the postgraduate level. He has taught on the [Core Principles of Mental Health Research](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/module-catalogue/modules/core-principles-of-mental-health-research-PSBS0002), [Practical Statistics for Mental Health Research](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/module-catalogue/modules/practical-statistics-for-mental-health-research-PSBS0008), and [Epidemiological Research Methods in Mental Health](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/module-catalogue/modules/epidemiological-research-methods-in-mental-health-PSBS0013) modules at UCL. More recently, he has co-developed curricula around open science and public involvement and engagement with research.
